articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: SA great explains India's balancing act as Kohli, Rohit return for AFG series - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The South African great explained India's balancing act as Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli have made their returns for the Afghanistan T20Is. | Cricket
articles.content: For the first time in 13 months, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will be leading the world-class batting lineup of Team India in the shortest format. Moving on from the World Cup heartbreak, Rohit's Tea… [+3079 chars]
